name: DreadOut 2
summary: A seal was broken, the great serpent Blorong has awakened. Witness Linda's journey looking for answers, redemption, and acceptance toward her role in stopping mankind's greatest threats. Dive deeper into a third-person horror adventure within DreadOut realm. Survive the Dread once more.
info:
• 中文名: 小镇惊魂2
